item.title: Tableau Tales : Data Price
item.author: saif.kabir.asif@gmail.com (Saif)
item.description:
Tableau Tales : Data Price

Author: Saif(saif.kabir.asif@gmail.com)

For last couple of years, I have been using Tableau extensively for professional purposes. I found Tableau to be extremely user friendly with very lenient learning curve although automations and integration with R and Python leave much to be desired. The good thing is that there is a public version of Tableau available for free.

For my first public dashboard, I have chosen to visualize data price per gigabyte of internet across 200+ countries. The data has been sourced from the excellent report by cable.co.uk.

Published on 2021-12-01 at My New Hugo Site, last modified on 2021-12-01
